column2: "So you're talking about how you can forgive a few mistakes as long as they're minor. Ah, well that's a pain..."
"Then again, if someone attacked me out of the blue I'd probably get pissed, too. But, dude, those guys go completely crazy!"
"I think you really need to see them in action. We already know they'll attack if attacked first, so you'll be prepared. I'm sure you can handle it."
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
